title: Wear Coin Flip
summary: Start the app, flip the coin, deal with the results! (designed for Android Wear)
description: Wear Coin Flip -  An Android Wear application.Simple easy to use coin flip application for Android Wearable devices.  Start the app, flip the coin, deal with the results...Does this app...... flip a coin?  Yes!... require an Android Wear device? Yes!... generate happiness with your decisions?  No!... developed by the coolest developers on earth?  No! (But we are awesome.)... make you waffles? No! ... make your cooler? descriptionHTML:
Wear Coin Flip - An Android Wear application.

Simple easy to use coin flip application for Android Wearable devices. Start the app, flip the coin, deal with the results...

Does this app...

... flip a coin? Yes!
... require an Android Wear device? Yes!
... generate happiness with your decisions? No!
... developed by the coolest developers on earth? No! (But we are awesome.)
... make you waffles? No!
... make your cooler? Possibly!

Hey, its free, doesn't require any permissions, and is fun for everyone. Use it any way you want. Enjoy!
comments: Absolutely Mind blowing When I first opened this app, I wasn't sure what to expect. But when I flipped the coin for the first time, I was shocked. The flawless flipping animation is the cream of the crop when it comes to coin flipping applications. All in all,  this app blew my mind. Thank you for helping me with all my coin flipping needs. This saved my marriage!

Almost didn't install - Glad I did I wasn't sure if this app would be useful or not, so I flipped a real coin and it said " yes". I'm happily leaving all important to my watch from now on. What could go wrong?
Useful This is useful but the 5 second wait feels too long. It would be nice if the wait was customizable.
Awesome! Just exactly what I wanted!
Like it says. Simple with no fuss.  Thanks!
recentChanges: - Adjusted flip time to 3 seconds.  (down from 5)
- Minor layout adjustment to phone app.
- Added support for "Start Coin Flip" voice command from wearable.
